entity.description:
To run the test you need to run a component server (1.45 minimum). 
Go to a component directory and run :  
mvn talend-component:web "-Dtalend.web.batch=true" "-Dtalend.web.batch.timeout=1" "-Dtalend.web.port=8081"  "-Dtalend.web.batch.timeout=5"

Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: tcomp_endpoints

entity.description:
This scenario will test all basic interaction with TCOMP component/index endpoint.

entity.description: The default call, without any parameter, should be in English with all elements.

entity.description:
Call of the endpoint with "q" parameter, the list length should be affected by the query.   
TODO do we need to test more query? https://jira.talendforge.org/browse/TCOMP-2352

entity.description:
Check the givens properties inside a components of the received list  
Related to bugs: TCOMP-2171
entity.name: component/index - content

entity.description: Call of the endpoint with "includeIconContent" parameter set to false, the response should not contain any icons files.
entity.name: component/index - includeIconContent - false

entity.description: Call of the endpoint with "includeIconContent" parameter set to false, the response should contain any icons files.
entity.name: component/index - includeIconContent - true

entity.description:
Expected: default answer (false)  
Call of the endpoint with "includeIconContent" parameter set to a wrong value, the response should not contain any icons files.

entity.description:
Expected:empty answer  
The error call, with a no "identifier" parameter, should return a 200 status with a empty content
entity.name: component/details - missing identifier

entity.description: The correct call, with one correct "identifiers" parameter, should be in English with one component.
entity.name: component/details - identifiers (one)

entity.description: The correct call, with two correct "identifiers" parameter, should be in English with two component.
entity.name: component/details - identifiers (two)

entity.description:
Check the properties inside the components details  
Related to bugs: TCOMP-2171
entity.name: component/details - content

The error call, with a wrong "identifier" parameter, should return a 400 status with a json content
entity.name: component/details - wrong identifier

entity.description: Call of the endpoint with "language" parameter set to "fr", the response should contain French words.
entity.name: component/details - language

Error call, without "identifier" parameter, should return a 200 status with an empty dependencies list

entity.description: Default call, with one correct "identifier" parameter, should return a 200 status with a content including more than one dependencies

entity.description:

entity.description:
Folder of languages specifics tests  
The fall back and default language should be English (en),  
For now only the following languages are supported in most of the connectors:
 - English (en)
 - Dutch (de)
 - French (fr)
 - Japanese (ja)

The demo connector have the following:
 - Default (en)
 - English (en)
 - Ukrainian (uk)
 - French (fr)
 - Japanese (ja)
 - Chinees(zh)

Api documentation is [here](https://talend.github.io/component-runtime/main/latest/rest-openapi.html)
entity.name: languages
